name: Shootygame
description:
A simple ship customiser followed by a short vertical spaceship shooter demo. Learnt much making this, for example don't spend 3/4 of the time building a ship customiser instead of the actual game! Managed to try out a few ideas I might use in a bigger game one day though so all in all was a pretty fun game jam!

CONTROLS:

Movement- directional keys

Shoot1 - Z

Shoot2 - X

Made for the 12 hour game jam November 2016 in Clickteam fusion 2.5

-Smada8
